channel.title: Need Help: First Login Effects
channel.description: I need to make it so when you first login it pops up the character creation window and the players thieving exp goes up by 1 so that the next time they login it will not pop up the character creation window. I have no idea how to do it but they do it with hp in richscape source. And if the hp is lower then 10 it will not pop up the window.

item.title: Need Help: First Login Effects

@Torax1 wrote:

I need to make it so when you first login it pops up the character creation window and the players thieving exp goes up by 1 so that the next time they login it will not pop up the character creation window. I have no idea how to do it but they do it with hp in richscape source. And if the hp is lower then 10 it will not pop up the window.
